attributes.action: Reimburse working parents when teacher training days occur so frequently in the school year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As working parents we are finding it so frustrating that we have to take annual leave from our jobs when we are notified of the ever increasing teacher training days, resulting in the use of annual leave to care for our children when as taxpayers we already pay for there education and should not be subsidising the training through our pay packets and well earned leave entitlement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
